alert.note: Alert for Oahu in Honolulu (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 01 at 12:31AM HST until January 01 at 5:45AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM HST EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE ISLAND OF OAHU IN HONOLULU COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The island of Oahu in Honolulu County. * WHEN...Until 415 AM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1230 AM HST, radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain over the island of Oahu. Rain was falling at a rate of 1 to 3 inches per hour. Water ponding reported on island roadways. The heaviest rain is falling over the western half of Oahu this morning. - Affected area include the entire island of Oahu. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 415 AM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding.
